The Time-Traveling Bunny: A Virtual Reality Adventure - In this immersive VR experience, players take on the role of a time-traveling bunny who must navigate through different eras of history to collect rare and exotic carrots. Each era presents a unique challenge, from ancient Egyptian pyramids to medieval castles, and players must use their wits and agility to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies.

The Carrot Chronicles - This animated series follows the adventures of a time-traveling bunny named Benny as he journeys through time, encountering famous historical figures and events. With the help of his trusty time-traveling carrot, Benny must solve puzzles and complete challenges to uncover the secrets of the past and save the future.

The Time-Traveling Bunny Escape Room - In this immersive escape room experience, players are trapped in a bunny-themed room and must work together to solve puzzles and uncover clues to escape before time runs out. Each room represents a different era of history, from ancient civilizations to modern times, and players must use their problem-solving skills and creativity to overcome obstacles and unlock the door.

The Time-Traveling Bunny Board Game - In this strategic board game, players take on the role of a time-traveling bunny who must navigate through different eras of history to collect resources and build a time machine. Each era presents a unique challenge, from ancient battles to natural disasters, and players must use their strategic thinking and resource management skills to overcome obstacles and achieve their goals.

The Time-Traveling Bunny Augmented Reality Game - In this innovative AR game, players use their mobile devices to create and customize their own time-traveling bunny avatar, which they can use to explore different eras of history. Players must collect virtual carrots and complete challenges to unlock new eras and customization options, all while avoiding obstacles and enemies in the real world.
